name: VentureBoy
description:
VentureBoy is curious to explore the life after Death so it risks his life and kills itself through getting bitten 3 times by the spider while losing his health.

**Touch the spider 3 times.

His death is the bridge between the two worlds.

Later if he wants to get back to his previous life, he must collect the hearts and gets his health back!

**Collect all 3 hearts.
